title: [Medicine] Pre-existing drug shows promise in the fight against the SARS-CoV-2 virus. Using computational analysis, a research team shows how ebselen binds to SARS CoV-2 main four protease.

[Epidemiology] The neuropeptides VIP and PACAP inhibit SARS-CoV-2 replication in monocytes and lung epithelial cells, decrease the production of proinflammatory cytokines, and VIP levels are associated with survival in severe Covid-19 patients
